means: （摆姿势让人画像或拍照的）一次（时间）

entry.tran: (因场地限制而分批用餐的)一批，一轮
entry.def: A sitting is one of the periods when a meal is served when there is not enough space for everyone to eat at the same time.
A sitting of a parliament, legislature, court, or other official body is one of the occasions when it meets in order to carry out its work.

example.ex: ...the recent emergency sittings of the UN Security Council.
example.tran: 联合国安全理事会最近召开的几次紧急会议

entry.tran: (总统或议员)现任的，在任期内的
entry.def: A sitting president or member of parliament is a present one, not a future or past one.

example.ex: ...the greatest clash in our history between a sitting president and an ex-president.
example.tran: 在我们的历史上发生的现任总统与前任总统之间最为严重的一次冲突

entry.tran: 处于优越地位;处于优势
entry.def: If you are sitting pretty, you are in a very favourable situation.

example.ex: If we'd let them buy it for a quarter of a million, we'd be sitting pretty by now.
example.tran: 要是当初我们让他以 25 万的价钱买下来的话，我们现在就会处于上风了。

means.word_mean: 1. (photography) the act of assuming a certain position (as for a photograph or portrait);

sentences.sentence: "he wanted his portrait painted but couldn't spare time for the sitting"

means.word_mean: 2. the act of assuming or maintaining a seated position;

sentences.sentence: "he read the mystery at one sitting"
"the seance was held in the medium's parlor"

means.word_mean: 4. a session as of a legislature or court
1. (of persons) having the torso erect and legs bent with the body supported on the buttocks;
2. not moving and therefore easy to attack;

auth_sentence.content: It's a stationary object, a sitting duck!
auth_sentence.res_content: It's a stationary object, a sitting duck!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's a stationary object, a sitting duck!

auth_sentence.content: Role may require standing and walking more than sitting.
auth_sentence.res_content: Role may require standing and walking more than sitting.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Role may require standing and walking more than sitting.

auth_sentence.content: Sitting is not what we are adapted to do.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sitting is not what we are adapted to do.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sitting is not what we are adapted to do.

Sentence.sentence: I couldn't bear to spend three hours sitting in a train every day.
Read at least several chapters at one sitting
The rest he got from sitting in a rocking chair.
You've been sitting at the computer for hours.

jushi.english: A hundred people can be served at one sitting.
I read the book at a single sitting.
jushi.chinese: 我坐着一口气把这本书读完了。
